info.name: IRCCloud input box fixes V2
info.description: A heavy-handed approach to adjusting the text input box. Intended to be used with IRCCloud Web Panel.
info.additionalInfo:
There's a lot more done with this style to make the input box not suck as bad as it usually does. A quick overview of what this style does:
  • Doubles the height of the input box
  • Moves the input box to the left
  • Rearranges buttons on the right
  • Removes default box shadows for Dawn theme
  • Apply theme-specific styling for the input box
  • Provides its own box shadow for input (Dawn theme only)
It was quite the renovation, but I feel the time spent making these changes are worth it, especially when seen in a web panel. To best use this style, you should visit IRCCloud's account options to disable User Icons under Layout & Design. Update 09/21/18 The area you can actually click on to start typing accurately reflects the perceived actionable area, which means anywhere you move at the input box actually lets you know you can type.
